wiki.content: "I Can't Make You Love Me" is a 1991 popular song, written by Mike Reid and Allen Shamblin and recorded by Bonnie Raitt on her Luck of the Draw album from that year. According to the I Can't Make You Love Me Songfacts, Reid got the idea for the song from a newspaper article about a guy who got drunk and shot up his girlfriend's car. When the judge sentenced him and asked him what he had learned, he said, "You can't make a woman love you if she don't." In August 2000, Mojo magazine voted "I Can't Make You Love Me" #8 on its The 100 Greatest Songs Of All Time list.[1] The song is ranked #331 on the Rolling Stone magazine's list of The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "I Can't Make You Love Me" is a 1991 popular song, written by Mike Reid and Allen Shamblin and recorded by Bonnie Raitt on her Luck of the Draw album from that year. According to the I Can't Make You Love Me Songfacts, Reid got the idea for the song from a newspaper article about a guy who got drunk and shot up his girlfriend's car. When the judge sentenced him and asked him what he had learned, he said, "You can't make a woman love you if she don't."

track.name: I Can't Make You Love Me
comments: super song sentimental gush love it.
sweet forgiveness does me the same way
This song is too perfect :)
I can't tell you how much this song used to hurt.
...gorgeous...
This song just tears my heart out.
quiet but at the same time so emotional.

"And I will give up this fight" - Easier to say it than it is to do it.
This song hits so close to home. Tugs at the heart strings everytime.

No other song has been able to describe the true heart wrenching feeling that a lost love brings the way this one has. That is why it remains one of my favorite songs forever.
One of my favorite tracks by Bonnie, who always delivers great music.

Heartbreaking true.  The words ture.  We have been through this once in our lives, but we have the strength to move on and find new beginnings.  In the end, we become stronger and know love.  This song speaks volumes to everyone.  Embrace it.
Heartbreakingly sad and beautiful...
Very SAD :\

Never fails to deliver - superb again and again...
I'll close my eyes, then I won't see the love you don't feel when you're holding me.
